manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
ğ–¨â€™ğ—ğ–¾ ğ—€ğ—ˆğ— ğ–º ğ—Œğ—ğ—‹ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ—€ ğ–»ğ–ºğ–¼ğ—„ğ—€ğ—‹ğ—ˆğ—ğ—‡ğ–½ ğ—‚ğ—‡ ğ–­ğ—ˆğ–½ğ–¾, ğ–¤ğ—‘ğ—‰ğ—‹ğ–¾ğ—Œğ—Œ, ğ–¬ğ—ˆğ—‡ğ—€ğ—ˆğ–£ğ–», ğ–±ğ–¾ğ–ºğ–¼ğ—, Docker, ğ–³ğ—’ğ—‰ğ–¾ğ—Œğ–¼ğ—‹ğ—‚ğ—‰ğ— ğ–ºğ—‡ğ–½ ğ—Œğ—ˆğ—†ğ–¾ ğ—ˆğ—ğ—ğ–¾ğ—‹ğ—Œ, ğ–ºğ—‡ğ–½ ğ–¨ ğ—ğ—ˆğ—ğ—…ğ–½ ğ—…ğ—‚ğ—„ğ–¾ ğ—ğ—ˆ ğ—‰ğ—ğ— ğ—ğ—ğ–¾ğ—Œğ–¾ ğ—ğ—ˆ ğ—€ğ—ˆğ—ˆğ–½ ğ—ğ—Œğ–¾ ğ—‚ğ—‡ ğ—†ğ—’ ğ–¿ğ—ğ—ğ—ğ—‹ğ–¾ ğ—‹ğ—ˆğ—…ğ–¾ğ—Œ. 

I would like to have a career with growth and to be able to move into different positions.
manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
â€¢ AWS Proficiency: 3 years of experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS), including EC2, EKS, S3, IAM, Lambda, AWS Batch, DynamoDB, and CloudFormation.

â€¢ Continuous Integration/Deployment: Proven experience in administering and building development CI pipelines of moderate complexity. Skilled in setting up build plans, assisting developers with failures, managing software configurations, and ensuring successful end-to-end deployments. Proficient in automating AWS resource provisioning and providing input on cloud environment setup and implementation plans, with CI/CD technologies such as Atlassian Bamboo, Octopus Deploy, MSBuild, NUnit, GIT, and Docker.

â€¢ Scripting and Automation Skills: Moderate experience with Typescript, Bash, Powershell, Python, and XML/JSON.

â€¢ Web Technologies: REST APIs, Single Page Applications (SPA), HTTP Get and Post methods.

â€¢ Experienced Systems Administrator: Proven experience in Linux Administration, Windows Administration, and IIS Management.

â€¢ Technical Support and Troubleshooting: Skilled in supporting developers with server troubleshooting and resolving application errors due to environmental issues. Proficient in debugging production outages, performing root cause analysis, and taking corrective actions to maintain system stability and uptime. Experienced in monitoring production environments and ensuring systems remain stable and operational.

â€¢ Developer Tool Support: Proficient in setting up development tools to facilitate application development, including configuring Git repositories and monitoring tools for developers.

Excellent Communication: Verbal and written communication skills in both English and Spanish.
